phrases: Work Log
Is that so, Denroku?
Yes.
I see...
Episode 21 Rebirth of Die
What?!
You are getting married?!
That is right.
One can only become a man through marriage.
But do you have to do it right now?!
Speaking from a financial viewpoint,
it is definitely a bad idea.
However, we have love!
Love saves the world!
We do not need a wedding ceremony!
We are going to combine our efforts
and help Madam Manager!
Is not that right, Takako?
Exactly so, Enishing.
Enishing?
Enishing means anything.
We have no secrets from each other!
We say anything to each other!
But, hey, I am happy for you.
Congratulations!
And what are we congratulating now?
Madam Manager!
I was planning on telling you formally, but...
Please, will you acknowledge our forthcoming marriage?
Do whatever you please.
Please wait!
Takako!
Wait, Mother!
You do not trust me, do you, Mother?
But, mark my words, I will definitely regain your trust!
I am prepared to work at this inn for the rest of my life!
So, please, Mother...
Could you stop calling me that?
Within the grounds of Kissuiso,
I am to be called Madam Manager,
and not Enishi's mother.
However, there is one requirement.
What?
If you are getting married, make sure you hold a wedding ceremony.
B-But...
Wedding ceremonies are not there for self-satisfaction.
You have a reputation to uphold as
the successor of Kissuiso.
If you cannot even understand that,
you have got a long way to go before you can take charge here.
It is leftover fish soup.
Would you care to join us, Miss Takako?
The scent of a reefy coast stings my troubled heart.
Man... I was not expecting her to be so stubborn about it...
Come on, she is just telling you to hold a proper ceremony.
That is right!
It is not like she is against it.
Holding a wedding reception at an ordinary hotel would
cost at least 1,600,000 yen.
I-I did not know it would cost that much to get married.
Why do not you use...
That is it!
Why do not you use Kissuiso for your grand marriage ceremony?!
What?!
If we help out, most of the costs would be covered!
That is a wonderful idea!
Takako!
Huh?
We cannot do that.
We would be interfering with the inn's normal operation.
Like you have never done that before.
Do not let that concern you.
Tohru, you are in charge of the food for the ceremony.
M-Me?!
That is right...
If I were to take on extra waitress duties that day...
Ohana and Nako can...
Awesome!
I am in charge of the food for the reception?!
Right, Minko, let us take a look at the market!
Okay!
Wow, it is finally begun!
I love you guys!
The days I just circled are supposed to be the luckiest.
Wow, there is not even a month left.
Yeah, the Bonbori Festival takes place in the fall, after all.
As the successor, I cannot hold my wedding
when the inn is at its busiest.
Then could not you delay the wedding until after that?
No, I cannot do that!
What if Takako changes her mind?!
Enishing, about the cost...
Coming!
How about some northern pink shrimp and righteye flounders?
It is got to be food for a celebration.
I have got to keep the costs down, but I need to make it
look festive as well as taste good.
It is a wedding,
so no one will blame me if the food is a little too extravagant.
Oh, the dish I had at the cultural festival was fun.
That omelet rice with LOVE written on it.
Perhaps I could do something similar with the carp...
Line them up and write LOVE with miso and vinegar.
I-I do not know about that...
Mr. Nori, can I take a look at that?
Sure!
Getting married is wonderful, is not it?
I am at an age where I am supposed to start thinking about that kind of stuff.
A-Already?!
Yeah.
I like kids.
I would like at least five or so.
F-Five?!
I prefer families to be noisy.
Something wrong?
N-Nothing.
Want to stop by?
W-Wait, but...
Tohru!
Come on, now!
Take a deep breath!
You will feel refreshed!
You have been acting a little odd recently, that is all.
Listen, both Mr. Ren and I have been in
the same position as you, a commis-chef.
Huh?
You may come to a standstill or get irritated
because things do not work out the way you want them to,
but what you gain from hard work will never betray you.
Everyone gets in a slump.
That is not what is been bugging me.
But... you are worried about me.
Umm, I...
Well...
I really want to make the young master's wedding ceremony a success!
I want to work with you to make it a success,
and after that...
After that...
there is something I want to...
Make it a success?
You are talking like Ohana now.
That girl always manages to get others involved in things.
Before you notice it, you are a part of it.
The atmosphere at the inn has changed a lot since she arrived.
Takako used to be just a nuisance.
Yeah, let us make it a success.
Do not copy her too much, though.
We do not need two troublemakers.
What else do we need for a wedding?
There is got to be some form of entertainment, right?
But we do not have the money...
Money?
That means naught when up against love.
Money means nothing?
I suggest you make remarks like that after you have finished paying your rent.
Wait a second!
It was just a line.
I was thinking that we could perform a skit at the ceremony,
like re-enacting how they fell in love.
That sounds fun!
But can any of us act?
It will be fine.
I have got the perfect line for you.
I-I am going to get pregnant!
Sexual harassment?
Oh, they are back!
Wow, you have bought so much already?!
I thought I would practice making it first.
All right!
Can I taste it?!
Dummy.
I will lend you a hand.
I touched something disgusting...
No, no...
Even if we keep the cost of the dress this low,
we still have the rings to worry about...
Enishing, I should get going now.
Oh, I will see you out.
It is fine.
Besides, we can use a rental dress.
The ring can also be cheap-
No, it cannot!
At least the ring's got to be nice!
Takako?
It is nothing.
Anyway, I am off.
Your name's Nako, right?
Y-Yes.
Adieu!
H-Hey...
Did I say something bad again?
Oh, is it because I suggested we hold the wedding here?
Is it too much effort for you?
But it is a wonderful thing,
and though it may be a lot of work-
What do you mean by a lot of work?
You are the one who said we should do it.
Let us have the wedding here.
With your loud, annoying, and disgusting voice.
Just hold on a sec.
I am used to loud and annoying,
but disgusting?!
We are the ones who get troubled by your whimsical actions.
Not just me.
Everyone.
Especially Tohru!
Tohru?
Yeah.
You are always relying on Tohru for everything.
Repay the debt!
What?
Go out with him!
What?
Go out with Tohru!
What?!
Wh-Why Tohru and me-
You are always pretending that you do not know.
You always take the best parts!
Think about Tohru's feelings!
Take responsibility for changing Kissuiso's atmosphere!
I do not know what the heck you are-
Shut up!
I am completely lost here,
but if I were to go out with Tohru,
what about you?!
Do not you like him?!
Why on Earth are you saying such things?!
Shut up!
Die!
Looks like die is back in fashion...
Hey!
That is charred!
H-Hot!
What are you doing?!
I am sorry!
Jeez... there goes breakfast.
I am sorry...
Minko, do not worry about helping out with the wedding anymore.
I will do it myself.
What?
How can you expect to be trusted if you cannot even perform your daily tasks?
You will be in Mr. Ren's way.
You look like you have got something to say.
I do not think...
I will ever be able to say it!
Minko...
Minchi!
H-How about we have lunch together?
Let us invite Oshimizu and we can all have lunch together.
I will give you some of my fried egg.
Oh, Oshimizu!
What is that?
Curtains.
The teacher said he was putting up new ones.
But they still look new!
They are changing them to red ones.
According to color therapy, it is supposed to be better for the students' minds.
A red classroom...
That is kind of erotic.
But it is kind of a waste, is not it?
It is not like we can help it.
Let us get this out of the way and have lunch, okay?
I wonder if we can use this...
What?
Where is Madam Manager and the others?
I hear Madam Manager's at a meeting.
The young master is with Takako, planning their wedding.
Planning their wedding, eh?
Takako's looking out into the blue.
She does not really seem to be so gung-ho about the idea.
I am sure she has a lot to worry about.
What was it... marriage browns?
You mean Bryans.
But you know, we are helping out with their marriage.
Why is the person we are helping out acting this way?!
Your natto's starting to bubble up.
What?
Natto tastes better if you stir it until it gets bubbly.
Really?
That is what I am talking about!
Perhaps I should search somewhere nearer for someone to marry.
Ah, I went off the line!
We have got a lot of curtains, so do not worry if you mess up.
Still, making a wedding dress out of curtains, eh?
That is an incredible idea.
I wanted to be of some help to Takako's wedding.
I did not think you would lend us a hand!
Oh, do not worry about it.
I love events like this.
Is not Ohana going to use the sewing machine?
She is apparently not very good with technology.
Oh...
What about cellphones?
I asked Minchi, but she refused to help.
Tohru likes me?
No, that cannot be true.
Well, I am not exactly good at noticing things...
like that situation with Ko...
No, but Ko is...
No, it is...
W-Wow, she is so fast!
And so accurate!
Cannot you make it cheaper?
I was your brother's classmate.
What?
You do not remember me?
It is been 15 years, but I still remember you.
W-Wait, do not hang up!
No, I am not done yet!
Hello, I am from Kissuiso.
We bought a large quantity of futons from your store six years ago.
I would like to call off the wedding with Enishi.
I understand why you will not acknowledge me!
I also understand why you cannot leave us in charge of this inn.
say anything to each other!
But you...
This is something I was given by my late husband.
He and I worked at the same inn.
He was a chef, and I was a waitress.
Around the same time we decided to get married,
the owner gave us an offer.
He asked whether we would like to succeed
an inn that had no successor.
From then on, we worked hard in order to restore it.
Denroku, who worked at the previous inn, helped us too.
We had no time or money to hold a wedding,
but he gave me this.
In hopes of Kissuiso becoming successful.
Kissuiso?
Yeah, that is what our inn will be called.
What?
The kanji in the name means, an inn to please you, Sui.
But we should think about the customers, not me.
We cannot please our customers without pleasing ourselves first.
But...
Besides, it is not just for you.
If you are pleased, so am I.
It is so beautiful...
Yeah.
He was always by my side after that.
He would always wish for my happiness.
It is still the same even after he passed away.
Marriage
is a promise not to let your spouse be alone, ever again.
Your spouse...
Yes, even if one of you passes away first.
So...
Takako, I entrust Enishi's happiness to you.
When you told us to have the marriage ceremony,
I assumed you were not planning on letting us succeed the inn.
Yes, that is correct.
I am not.
What?
Now, for the baiser amor!
Come at me if you can!
I am so touched!
What?
Touched?
Oh, please...
Episode 22 A Determined One-Sided Crush
It is not weird.
